thread.title: This Dad of the Year blocked his toddler from getting hit in the face by a shot
thread.title_full: This Dad of the Year blocked his toddler from getting hit in the face by a shot

title: This Dad of the Year blocked his toddler from getting hit in the face by a shot
text:
Feb 12, 2017 at 12:30p ET 0 
Not all heroes wear capes. Sometimes they wear Burnley beanies. That was a close call! pic.twitter.com/fsdnrELm8o 
— NBC Sports Soccer (@NBCSportsSoccer) February 12, 2017 
The first row right behind the goal is a dangerous place to take a child for this very specific reason. It’s not unlikely that you get a shot zooming at you and if you’re carrying the child, you’re limited in your ability to get your hands in front of the kid. That’s why it needs to be a team effort, with one carrying the child and the other playing defense. 
This great teamwork was probably inspired by their team. After all, Burnley managed a draw against Premier League leaders Chelsea. But it was this dad who stole the show.
